column5: Maple Creek Bed and Breakfast offers the best of both worlds â€“ the quietness and peacefulness of the country while being close to the bustling action and activities of Houston. With 5.5 acres of land, you will have plenty of room to stretch your legs and enjoy the calm of the outdoors. Our unique guestrooms are furnished with ultimate comfort in mind, and our upstair suite features a Whirlpool tub fit for two. Check out our website for more information and pictures: www.maplecreekbnb,com
